history.proof: intros m z t u H1 H2. split. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - hauto use: Iter_comp unfold: expo.

ctx: intros m z t u H1 H2.
intros m z t u H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros m z t u H1 H2. intros H3 H4. split. - apply expo_exd with t; auto. - destruct H3 as [H3p [i Hi]]. destruct H4 as [H4p [j Hj]]. exists (i + j). split. + omega. + rewrite Iter_comp with (n := i) (p := j). * reflexivity. * auto. * auto.
